comments.author: Chaba.5410
comments.body: I’m more than happy to have a co-maintainer. Primarily it’s a wrapper for pulling game data into a Drupal website.

comments.author: alkaaran.3258
comments.body: What are you planning to do in this module? If you want some help, getting this project out of sandbox mode or if you need a co-maintainer, don’t hesitate

comments.author: Chaba.5410
comments.body: Oh this is neat! I’ve started a Drupal module to integrate with this API. It’s a sandbox project.
